title: Understanding Data Classification
text: Consider how a well-structured data classification system can impact both the security and usability of data. Think about the balance between protecting sensitive information and allowing for its effective use.

title: Impact on Customers and Business
text: Reflect on how data classification can influence customer trust and business growth. How does ensuring data privacy contribute to a positive relationship with customers?

hintAnswer: protecting your customers while growing your business
title: Evaluating the Options
text: Let's evaluate the given options. Which option best aligns with the goal of maintaining customer trust while supporting business objectives?
choices: protecting your customers while growing your business
eliminating privacy risks by deleting all data
